loveNotes.text: When I see your face, there's not a thing that I would change, cause you're amazing just the way you are. And when you smile the whole world stops and stares for a while cause, girl, you're amazing just the way you are.
loveNotes.author: Bruno Mars - Just The Way You Are

loveNotes.text: There's nothing in this world, there's not another girl that could satisfy my needs. There's nothing in this world, there's not another boy that can make me feel so sweet.
loveNotes.author: Sean Kingston - There's Nothin

loveNotes.text: I love to see your face when you wake up next to me while you lay in my arms.
I love you because of your personal qualities and I secretly wish that I would have some of the qualities that you have you.
I love you because you are confident and headstrong in every situation.
I love you because you are confident and headstrong in every situation.
I love you because you goal oriented and you put in the work to achieving your goals.
I love you, plain and simple, I just fucking love you!
If you read this in the morning, I hope you have an amazing day. If you read this in the evening, I hope you had an amazing day.
There is no other girl that can compare to you, you are on a whole 'nother level
I said it before and I'll say it again, I will always show you how much you mean to me.
Honestly, I think we are the greatest couple out there. No other relationship comes even close to ours.
We have good times and we have bad times, but I wouldn't have it any other way.
Remember when, we were both nervous on our first date, and I was so nervous that I didn't know how to greet you and I said <q>naaaa csá!!!</q>
Remember our first trip to Aarhus, and we were looking for a place to eat and we almost went into a Sunset Boulavard, but I wanted to find something more romantic.
Remember our first time having sex!! We weren't that good at first, but it just keeps getting better and better.
Remember when we jumped together in the pool with Géza, I was already trying to impress you with how big I can jump.
Remember when we went to the Frederiksberg Spa in Copenhagen and we were dying in the sauna!!
I love you because we are a team, when we have a problem, it is not you against me, it is us against the problem.
Because she competes with no one, no one can compete with her.
loveNotes.author: Lao Tzu

loveNotes.text: Taking a cruise down the Danube.
Making a fort out of bedsheets and pillows!!
Watching the sunset and sunrise in one day.
You know it's love when home is not a place, but a person.
There is no life as complete as the life that is lived by choice.
loveNotes.author: Shad Helmstetter

loveNotes.text: Life is much more fun if you live it in the spirit of play and collaboration, working with instead of against others.
loveNotes.author: Wally Amos

loveNotes.text: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
You may hold my hand for a while, but you hold my heart forever.
Remember when we were watching the Phlake concert in Christiania and my arms were wrapped around you.
I truly enjoy making gifts for you, because I know it's for you, and you appreciate even the smallest of gifts.
Remember when we started making websites and you were so frustrated with HTML and CSS.
Remember when we started our OneNote, because honestly I don't, but now I wouldn't be able to live without our Szevin OneNote notebook. If you remember tell me which was our first section?
Remember when we were so far away from each other, on other sides of the world, but we still kept in touch through text and calling.
Remember when the day we first met and we went to drink VBK at you and Kriszti's place.
Remember when we played volleyball in Odense, and I was serving the volleyball like a beast, mainly to impress you.
I love you because to me you are the most gorgeous girl in the world.
I love you because I melt inside when I see you smile.
And IIIIIIIIIIIIII will alwaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaays loooooooovvvveeeeeee yoooooouuuuuuuuu!
loveNotes.author: Whitney Houston - I Will Always Love You

loveNotes.text: See the way you moving, no need for introducing, You're everything a man could want, You and I, we both know, Only one with this course, Baby let me take you home
loveNotes.author: Fais ft Afrojack - Hey

loveNotes.text: Oh baby, why don't you just meet me in the middle? I'm losing my mind just a little, So why don't you just meet me in the middle? In the middle
loveNotes.author: Zedd, Maren Morris and Grey - The Middle

loveNotes.text: Sitting and chilling in a hot water spring.
Making love in a jaqcuzzi.
Going wine tasting!!
I love you because you're so organized and I saw this when you showed me your bullet journal and also your recipe book on our first date.
Remember when we made out in Blomsten & Bien.
No one ever finds life worth living - one has to make it worth living.
loveNotes.author: Winston Churchill

loveNotes.text: The flower that blooms in adversity is the most rare and beautiful of all.
loveNotes.author: The Emporer from Mulan

loveNotes.text: Life has no limitations, except the ones you make.
loveNotes.author: Les Brown

loveNotes.text: Remember that you are my greatest treasure.
